SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package com.floweektracker.tasksDatabase

Class TasksDatabaseListeners

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.tasksDatabase.TasksDatabaseListeners
class TasksDatabaseListeners extends Object
Represents the UI handling for TasksDatabaseUI instance, managing user interactions and events within the TasksDatabaseUI.taskDatabaseDialog. This class encapsulates the logic for handling user interactions and events in the tasks database UI.

Fields:
  • tasksDatabaseUI - a TasksDatabaseUI reference representing the UI of the task names database
Methods:
  • setupListeners() - adds listeners to all components of the TasksDatabaseUI.taskDatabaseDialog
Listeners creators:
  • createButtonsListener() - creates a listener for the TasksDatabaseUI.buttons
  • createTasksJListListener() - creates a listener for the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList
  • createTaskInputFieldListener() - creates a listener for the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField

  • Constructor Details

    • TasksDatabaseListeners

      TasksDatabaseListeners(TasksDatabaseUI tasksDatabaseUI)
      Constructs a new TasksDatabaseListeners instance with the specified tasksDatabaseUI. This constructor initializes reference to the tasksDatabaseUI. Finally, it invokes the setupListeners() method to set up listeners for the components in the TasksDatabaseUI.taskDatabaseDialog.
      Parameters:
      tasksDatabaseUI - a TasksDatabaseUI instance representing the UI of the task names database.
      See Also:
      • TasksDatabaseUI.setupTaskDialog()

  • Method Details

    • setupListeners

      void setupListeners()
      Adds listeners to the components in the TasksDatabaseUI.taskDatabaseDialog. These listeners include those for buttons, task list selection, and task input field changes.
      See Also:
      • TasksDatabaseListeners(TasksDatabaseUI)
      • createButtonsListener()
      • createTaskInputFieldListener()
      • createTasksJListListener()

    • createButtonsListener

      private ActionListener createButtonsListener()
      Creates an ActionListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.buttons. This listener retrieves the task name from the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField first and then determines which button was clicked.

      If the adding button is clicked:
      • the task is added to the database using TasksDatabaseManager.addTaskToList(String)
      • the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList is updated
      • the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField is cleared
      If the deleting button is clicked:
      • the task is removed from the database using TasksDatabaseManager.deleteTaskFromList(String)
      • the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList is updated
      • the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField is cleared
      If the cancelling button is clicked, the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField is cleared.
      Returns:
      an ActionListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.buttons
      See Also:
      • setupListeners()

    • createTasksJListListener

      private ListSelectionListener createTasksJListListener()
      Creates a ListSelectionListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList. This listener checks if the selected value in the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList is adjusting. If it's not, it sets the selected value into the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField.
      Returns:
      a ListSelectionListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.tasksList
      See Also:
      • setupListeners()

    • createTaskInputFieldListener

      private DocumentListener createTaskInputFieldListener()
      Creates a DocumentListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField. This listener monitors changes in the JTextField and reacts accordingly.
      Returns:
      a DocumentListener for the TasksDatabaseUI.taskInputField
      See Also:
      • setupListeners()
